name: Question File
summary: File created by Nosza légy má Te is MILIJOMOS, a Hungarian program based on the "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?" game show; contains questions asked during the game; organized by level of difficulty, based on how much money is at stake, and picked randomly by the program; its text format enables easy editing and addition of other questions using the "NLMTIM Editor."

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: KónyiSoft Nosza légy má Te is MILIJOMOS
